sourcesContent:
import React from "react";
import styles from "./FactorySearchForm.module.css";

const FactorySearchForm = (props) => {
  console.log(props.formSubmitted);
  return (
    <form onSubmit={props.onSubmitFactoryHandler}>
      <label htmlFor="cars">Choose factory:</label>
      <select
        onChange={props.onGetEquipmentTypeHandler}
        id="equipment"
        name="equipment"
      >
        <option value="">Select Equipment</option>
        <option value="1">Tires</option>
        <option value="3">Brake Hoses</option>
        <option value="13">Glazing</option>
        <option value="16">Retread</option>
      </select>
      <select onChange={props.onGetReportTypeHandler} id="cars" name="cars">
        <option value="">Select Report</option>
        <option value="new">New</option>
        <option value="updated">Updated</option>
        <option value="closed">Closed</option>
        <option value="all">All</option>
      </select>
      <select onChange={props.onGetYearHandler} id="years" name="years">
        <option value="">Select Year</option>
        <option value="2012">2012</option>
        <option value="2013">2013</option>
        <option value="2014">2014</option>
        <option value="2015">2015</option>
      </select>
      <button disabled={!props.formSubmitted}>Get a factory</button>
    </form>
  );
};

export default FactorySearchForm;
